text_block_list.text:
On this day, a meeting was being held to discuss improvements 
on how to fully utilize the training course, but――

I had presented a proposal, but it was rejected. 
A different trainer's proposal would be considered instead.

………… 
……At a time like this, what would she say?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Isn't it Marvelous!?☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Being able to give a presentation is Marvelous☆ Even if it's 
frustrating, being able to accept someone's proposal is Marvelous★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Put it all together, and it's very Marvelous☆ 
With the new proposal, the proposal after it will be even better★

……She'd probably say something like that. I can't stay down 
forever. I'll work harder so next time they'll choose mine.
What a wonderful word.

Just thinking about that word makes me feel bright and positive. 
It kind of makes you want to just say it out loud――!
Marvelous☆★☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations! You passed! 
How very Marvelous★

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
No, it's not. It true that I avoided failing but…… 
My score is better than before but it's still below average……

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: No! That's not true!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: E-eeh!? W-where is this……!?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
If it's better than before, that means you've made progress☆ 
It's amazing that you've improved! Marvelous★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
And it's improvement in something you were bad at! 
You worked really hard, didn't you? Marvelous☆★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Just like this, let's get Marvelous at more things☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
If you keep piling up these Marvelous things then, 
it'll be an even biiiiigger Marvelous☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: That's why――

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Huh……just now, what was that……?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
This result was Marvelous☆ 
You need to be more and more happy about this Marvelous★

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
……you're right. 
My score has gone up, hasn't it……?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Ah, you're Marvelous-san's……!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
……Believe in myself……
Yeah, I……was able to increase my score all by myself.
choice_data_list: Yeah! Next time you'll do better!
Yeah! Next time you'll do better!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Right……yeah! 
I'm starting to feel a little more confident in myself!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
I'll be able to do my best for the next test too! 
Both of you, thank you very much!
After saying that, she left with a smile on her face.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa! She had a nice smile on her face, huh! 
Her and Trainer too! Very happy smiles, Marvelous☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! It was really Marvelous, you know☆ 
When you called out to her, it was absolutely Marvelous☆★☆

Her positiveness……no, her "Marvelous-ness" made everything, 
no matter how trivial, seem to sparkle.

Not just by turning the negative in to positive―― 
but by turning the positive in to an even bigger positive.

It was just a matter of time before her Marvelous 
spread around the world, just as she wished.

I wanted to assist with her dream, even if 
I could only contribute a small amount.
